Description:
The luxurious Efendi Hotel features a beautiful terrace with panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. It is located in the historic centre of Acre and built on the remains of two connecting ancient buildings.

Only a 10-minute walk from the beach, this hotel is surrounded by picturesque alleys and is 100 metres from the promenade. The Jezzar Pasha Mosque is 200 metres away.

The rooms, each of it with its own unique design, are equipped with a TV, air conditioning, comfortable large beds, mini fridge, Nespresso machine, a safe, Wi Fi and more. In addition, the hotel has a large roof terrace with a panoramic view over the Mediterranean Sea, from Haifa to Rosh Hanikra.

Breakfast takes place in a dining hall around a knights table which is dated back to the early Ottomans Empire.

A relaxing session in the Turkish bath or in the massage rooms is not to be missed.

The Efendi Hotel has a 900-year-old wine cellar where guests can enjoy a special collection of local Israeli wines. Eretz-Hgalil is situated in the vegetarian village of Amirim, in the North of Israel. It offers luxurious suites with garden view, and free welcome drink and chocolates.

With free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a fully equipped kitchen, each unit has a private bathroom with spa bath.

Treatments and massages are available on request. Guests have free access to the swimming pool located in the village.

The property is 2 km from the nearest bus stop. The owner provides a free pick-up service, and jeep excursions of Galilee at extra charges. Based on local tax laws, guests with a tourist visa to Israel are exempted from paying VAT for their reservation. Israeli citizens and residents ("non tourists" as defined in the VAT law) must pay VAT. This tax is automatically calculated in the total cost of the reservation for domestic customers. For guests booking from outside of Israel, the tax is not included in the total price.

Check-in on Saturdays and at the end of Jewish holidays is available from 17:00 Please note the village is strictly vegetarian, guests are not allowed to bring meat. Please note the swimming pool is 1 kilometre away and open to the public. It is open all day in July and August, and at the weekend in September.

Description:
Roof of the Galilee is located in Amirim, 25 km from the Sea of Galilee. Offering luxuriously equipped units with spa baths and unique views of the surroundings, the property is fitted with a spacious garden. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Guests can also enjoy horseback riding, 22 km away, while ATV tours are organised 11 km away. The town of Safed is 19 km away, while Tiberias is located 33 km from Roof of the Galilee.
